combinationSkills.name: Magic Blast
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. M.Attack activates aft. S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension-unlocked Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Can be Units of same character.

combinationSkills.name: Top Familia Executives
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. P.Attack activates aft. S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension upgraded(x3+) Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Cannot be Units of same character.

combatSkills.name: Flowing Currency
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Ultra Water M.Attack Dmg.+60% per each [Self] Mag. Buff Skill

combatSkills.name: Water Cloak
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Lo Water M.Attack & [Allies] Mag. and Water Attack Dmg.+40%/3 turns

combatSkills.name: Whelming Water
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Water M.Attack w/Hi Penetration Rate & removes Str. Buff exc. Assist Skills

combatSkills.name: Swelling Wave
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Super Water M.Attack w/Hi Unguard Rate & Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target)+20%/3 turns

passiveSkills.name: Will of Water
passiveSkills.description: When countering and attacking, regular M.Attack a Foe with Water Element.
